components.description:
An emoji version of the digit 4, created via a variation selector.

Not given emoji presentation on Apple or Microsoft devices, or on platforms such as Facebook and Twitter / X. Microsoft did previously support this emoji within Windows 8 and Windows 10.
components.title: Digit Four

components.description: An emoji component character that may appear as a square with rounded corners on certain platforms.
components.title: Combining Enclosing Keycap

description: The number 4 on a square with rounded corners, designed to look like a keycap.
title: Keycap Digit Four

version.description: The following characters we added to Unicode in 1999, with most being given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

emoji_net_data.definition: Keycap Digit Four was approved as part of Unicode 3.0 in 1999 and added to Emoji 3.0 in 2016. Copy and paste this emoji: Copy http://emojipedia.org/keycap-digit-four/
emoji_net_data.name: keycap: 4

bn:00096026a: Coming next after the third and just before the fifth in position or time or degree or magnitude

bn:00085859v: To determine the number (of objects in a group).
Determine the number or amount of

bn:00058285n: A concept of quantity involving zero and units
Mathematical object used to count, label, and measure
A number is one of several related types of mathematical objects.
A member of one of several classes: natural numbers, integers, rational numbers, real numbers, complex numbers, quaternions.
A set of numerals for representing numbers.

bn:00000111n: In mathematics, the quaternions are a number system that extends the complex numbers.

The tetractys, or tetrad, is a triangular figure consisting of ten points arranged in four rows: one, two, three, and four points in each row, which is the geometrical representation of the fourth triangular number.
4 is a number, numeral, and glyph.
Similarly, are typically represented by i, j, and k.
The cardinal number occurring after three and before five, represented in Roman numerals as IV, in Arabic numerals as 4.
The cardinal number that is the sum of three and one

note: This emoji was found in merged_emojis_before_fluentui but not in FluentUI
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the keycap digit four emoji is a clean, bold representation of the number four, enclosed within a rounded, tactile keycap. Apple's signature glossy finish and realistic lighting give it a polished, almost physical feel, as if it were a real button on a keyboard. This emoji is straightforwardly used for numerical representation, indicating quantity, order, or a specific choice within messages on Apple devices.
